decks.notes: The key principle of this deck revolves around controlling the game and ramping up mana to maximize the damage potential of Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle. The deck aims to control the board with cards like Inferno Titan and Lotus Cobra while also using cards like Harrow and Explore to ramp up mana quickly. Primeval Titan and Khalni Heart Expedition provide additional opportunities for mana acceleration. The addition of Koth of the Hammer further enhances mana generation. Ultimately, the goal is to have Valakut in play with enough Mountains to deal significant damage to the opponent.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells and board wipes, while also using cards like Squadron Hawk and Stoneforge Mystic to search for key equipment cards like Sword of Body and Mind and Sword of Feast and Famine. The deck aims to control the board with cards like Day of Judgment and Gideon Jura while also utilizing powerful planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor. The mana base allows for consistent access to both white and blue mana sources, as well as utility lands like Celestial Colonnade and Tectonic Edge.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game through a combination of counterspells, removal, and powerful planeswalkers like Gideon Jura and Jace, the Mind Sculptor. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Mana Leak, Spell Pierce, and Day of Judgment while also generating card advantage through Squadron Hawk and Stoneforge Mystic. The inclusion of swords like Sword of Body and Mind and Sword of Feast and Famine provides additional threats and utility. Overall, the deck focuses on maintaining board control and card advantage to outlast and outvalue the opponent.

This RUG Control deck focuses on using powerful creatures like Precursor Golem, Avenger of Zendikar, and Inferno Titan to control the board and generate value. The deck also includes mana acceleration with Lotus Cobra and ramp spells like Explore to quickly play large threats. With versatile removal in Lightning Bolt and counter spells like Mana Leak, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while drawing cards with Preordain and taking advantage of powerful planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Garruk Wildspeaker to secure victory.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game through a combination of counterspells, board wipes, and powerful planeswalkers like Gideon Jura and Jace, the Mind Sculptor. Stoneforge Mystic is used to search for powerful equipment like Sword of Body and Mind and Sword of Feast and Famine to equip to creatures like Squadron Hawk. Sun Titan can be used to bring back important creatures or equipment from the graveyard. The deck aims to outvalue opponents by generating card advantage and efficiently dealing with threats.

The main focus of this deck is to control the board with removal spells like Doom Blade and Day of Judgment, while also disrupting the opponent's hand with cards like Inquisition of Kozilek and Duress. The deck also aims to generate card advantage with Squadron Hawk and Stoneforge Mystic, allowing for a more consistent draw. The deck's win condition involves using powerful planeswalkers like Gideon Jura and Jace, the Mind Sculptor to establish control of the game and close it out with Sword of Feast and Famine.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent quickly with aggressive creatures and burn spells. The goal is to deal as much damage as possible in the early turns by playing efficient threats like Goblin Guide and Plated Geopede, while also using burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Burst Lightning to remove blockers or finish off the opponent. The deck aims to put pressure on the opponent from the start and maintain that pressure throughout the game to secure a swift victory.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through ramping up mana and utilizing landfall triggers to trigger Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle and deal damage to the opponent's creatures or face. The deck uses cards like Harrow, Cultivate, and Explore to search for and play multiple lands per turn, allowing Valakut to become a powerful win condition. Additionally, the deck includes big creatures like Primeval Titan and Inferno Titan to provide additional threats and pressure to the opponent.

This Boros Landfall deck focuses on quickly developing your board presence with aggressive creatures that benefit from landfall triggers. By playing low-cost creatures and cheap removal spells, you can pressure your opponent early on and maintain a strong board presence. Utilizing cards like Goblin Guide and Steppe Lynx alongside equipment like Basilisk Collar and Bonehoard, you can easily overwhelm your opponent with aggressive plays. With a mix of land-fetching spells and dual lands, you can consistently trigger landfall abilities and keep up the pressure throughout the game.

This deck focuses on aggressive landfall triggers to quickly overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and equipment. By consistently playing lands and utilizing landfall abilities, the deck is able to maintain pressure on the opponent while also controlling the board through removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Journey to Nowhere. The inclusion of equipment like Sword of Body and Mind and Bonehoard further enhances the deck's ability to close out games quickly. The synergy between creatures like Steppe Lynx and Plated Geopede with landfall triggers makes this deck a formidable force in 1 vs 1 matches.

This deck focuses on controlling the board through a combination of counterspells, removal, and board wipes, while also utilizing the card advantage of Squadron Hawk and Stoneforge Mystic to establish a strong presence. The goal is to control the game until the late game where powerful threats like Sun Titan and Gideon Jura can take over. The deck also features a strong equipment package with Sword of Feast and Famine and Sylvok Lifestaff to provide additional value and resilience against opposing strategies. It aims to outvalue and outlast opponents in a long game.

This deck aims to ramp up mana quickly using various sources, such as Birds of Paradise and Overgrown Battlement, to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, Kozilek, and Ulamog. It uses spells like Cultivate, Explore, and Green Sun's Zenith to search for lands and creatures efficiently. With Wurmcoil Engine and Avenger of Zendikar providing additional threats, the deck also includes disruption with Acidic Slime and removal with All Is Dust. The inclusion of cards like Summoning Trap and Eye of Ugin further enhances the deck's ability to quickly deploy massive threats and control the game.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through removal spells and counterspells while utilizing powerful artifacts and creatures like Stoneforge Mystic and Squadron Hawk to gain card advantage and pressure the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Sword of Feast and Famine and Gideon Jura provide additional win conditions and ways to close out the game. By efficiently disrupting the opponent's game plan and establishing a strong board presence, this deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent to secure victory.

The main concept of this deck revolves around gaining control of the game by using counterspells and removal spells to constantly answer threats from the opponent. The deck aims to stall the game with defensive creatures like Wall of Omens and control spells such as Mana Leak and Condemn, while also generating card advantage and board control with cards like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Sun Titan. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the control strategy, and the inclusion of planeswalkers like Jace Beleren and Venser, the Sojourner adds additional utility and flexibility to the deck.

This deck focuses on playing aggressive red creatures and burning spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent and overwhelm them before they have a chance to stabilize. The deck includes efficient creatures like Goblin Guide and Kargan Dragonlord along with burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Searing Blaze to clear blockers and finish off the opponent. The goal is to consistently apply pressure and close out the game as quickly as possible by combining creature damage with direct damage spells.

This deck focuses on controlling the game by using powerful creatures like Precursor Golem and Inferno Titan to dominate the battlefield. With an emphasis on mana ramping and card selection, cards like Lotus Cobra, Explore, and Preordain help accelerate your game plan. Counterspells like Mana Leak provide protection while burn spells like Lightning Bolt offer additional removal. The planeswalkers Garruk Wildspeaker and Jace, the Mind Sculptor provide additional value and card advantage. Overall, this deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver opponents with efficient threats and disruptive spells.
